content: MH-R45 Strut clamp Rigid strut clamp with angled top for attaching tubing and pipes to strut channels ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Pipe supports- - - ### FEATURES:Features Tightening screw at 45Â° angle for easy access One piece out of the box, simply break apart and install Innovative design requires no nuts for fast and easy assembly ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Carbon steel Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Pre-galvanized Environmental conditions: Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) Technical Data | Material composition | Carbon steel | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Pre-galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) | Tightening torque | 5 ft-lbf | Cross section width - b | 1-1/4 in ### ITEMS- 2008810 - Rigid strut clamp MH-R45 1/2 PG - Package Size 100 pc - 2008811 - Rigid strut clamp MH-R45 3/4 PG - Package Size 100 pc - 2008812 - Rigid strut clamp MH-R45 1 PG - Package Size 100 pc - 2008813 - Rigid strut clamp MH-R45 1-1/4 PG - Package Size 50 pc - 2008814 - Rigid strut clamp MH-R45 1-1/2 PG - Package Size 50 pc - 2008815 - Rigid strut clamp MH-R45 2 PG - Package Size 50 pc - 2008816 - Rigid strut clamp MH-R45 2-1/2 PG - Package Size 25 pc - 2008817 - Rigid strut clamp MH-R45 3 PG - Package Size 25 pc - 2008818 - Rigid strut clamp MH-R45 4 PG - Package Size 25 pc - 2008819 - Rigid strut clamp MH-R45 6 PG - Package Size 10 pc - 2008820 - Rigid strut clamp MH-R45 8 PG - Package Size 10 pc
